column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Brittney - Thanks for your review. Over the years I have visited numerous ramen shops worldwide
column2: and I've spent anywhere between $8 and $20 for a bowl of ramen. What I have learned is that each ramen shop is unique in its own way -- from the noodles and broth they use
column3: to the side dishes they serve
column4: to the price points they target. Here in Midtown
column5: goods and services trend toward the pricier side. Also
column6: I do agree that our core demographic isn't families with young infants and toddlers. However
column7: I will say this hasn't stopped hundreds of families from visiting us. In fact
column8: I'm grateful our high chairs are sturdily built because they get a lot of use. Regardless
column9: I appreciate your feedback and your patronage and we look forward to serving you again soon!
